channel.title: 3Worlds - The Shamanism Podcast
channel.description: A series of podcasts about shamanism (and a bit of music and other 'off-topic' things) by Nicholas Breeze Wood, joint editor of Sacred Hoop Magazine, the international magazine about shamanic spirituality, author of books on shamanism and well known shamanic practitioner and craftsperson.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Come and join the circle
channel.itunes:author: Nicholas Breeze Wood
channel.itunes:summary: A series of podcasts about shamanism (and a bit of music and other 'off-topic' things) by Nicholas Breeze Wood, joint editor of Sacred Hoop Magazine, the international magazine about shamanic spirituality, author of books on shamanism and well known shamanic practitioner and craftsperson.

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast Episode 28
item.description: Second of a two part interview with the shamanic painter Faith Nolton ( Jan Morgan Wood) about her work and the nature of sacred images. Faith Nolton Website - www.maytreegallery.co.uk The 3Worlds podcast home page is at www.3worlds.co.uk. Sacred Hoop - the shamanism Magazine www.sacredhoop.org Nicholas Breeze Wood's website at www.nicholaswood.net. See also www.myspace.com/nicholasbreezewood and www.myspace.com/sacredhoopmagazine Follow Nicholas on Twitter at http://twitter.com/NicktheBreeze

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast Episode 26
item.description: Nicholas Breeze Wood introduces a talk given by sun Bear in London in 1986. In this talk Sun Bear talks about dreaming. Follow Nicholas on Twitter at http://twitter.com/NicktheBreeze The 3Worlds podcast home page is at www.3worlds.co.uk. Sacred Hoop - the shamanism Magazine www.sacredhoop.org Nicholas Breeze Wood's website at www.nicholaswood.net. See also www.myspace.com/nicholasbreezewood and www.myspace.com/sacredhoopmagazine

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast Episode 22
item.description: An experiment using a computer generated voice to read an article from a back issue of Sacred Hoop Magazine. This is not really a normal 3Worlds podcast. item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast Episode 21
item.description: Nicholas Breeze Wood talks about a few of the more unusual shamanic musical traditions of the world, and introduces the use of the jaw's harp - a traditional tool of Siberian shamanism Follow Nicholas on Twitter at http://twitter.com/NicktheBreeze The 3Worlds podcast home page is at www.3worlds.co.uk. Sacred Hoop - the shamanism Magazine www.sacredhoop.org Nicholas Breeze Wood's website at www.nicholaswood.net. See also www.myspace.com/nicholasbreezewood and www.myspace.com/sacredhoopmagazine

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast Episode 19

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast - Episode 15
item.description: A third podcast about the teachings of the Medicine Wheel. The music on the end of the podcast is the troubadour song 'S’anc fuy belha ni prezada', performed by Sinfonye The 3Worlds podcast home page is at www.3worlds.co.uk. Remember to visit Sacred Hoop - the shamansim magazine www.sacredhoop.org and you can visit Nicholas Breeze Wood's website at www.nicholaswood.net. See also www.myspace.com/nicholasbreezewood and www.myspace.com/sacredhoopmagazine

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast - Episode 14
item.description: A second podcast about the teachings of the Medicine Wheel. The music on the end of the podcast is the troubadour song 'a song about nothing' by the very first troubadour William IX Duke of Aquitaine (1071 - 1126) who was grandfather to Eleanor of Aquitaine. Performed by Martin Best The 3Worlds podcast home page is at www.3worlds.co.uk. Remember to visit Sacred Hoop - the shamansim magazine www.sacredhoop.org and you can visit Nicholas Breeze Wood's website at www.nicholaswood.net. See also www.myspace.com/nicholasbreezewood and www.myspace.com/sacredhoopmagazine

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast - Episode 12
item.description: A podcast about Viking Seidr The 3Worlds podcast home page is at www.3worlds.co.uk. Remember to visit Sacred Hoop - the shamansim magazine www.sacredhoop.org and you can visit Nicholas Breeze Wood's website at www.nicholaswood.net. For workshops on shamanism with Nicholas Breeze Wood visit www.earthstarcentre.com The Society for Shamanic Practitioners www.shamansociety.org The drawing for this podcast is a seidr ceremony drawn by Jan Morgan Wood - it illustrated an article on Seidr which is available for free download (together with the rest of the issue) at www.sacredhoop.org/Issues-pdf/Issue-18.pdf The music at the end of this podcast is improvisation in early medieval Norse style from the CD 'Edda - An Icelandic Saga' by Sequentia
item.dc:creator: Nicholas Breeze Wood
item.itunes:summary:
A podcast about Viking Seidr
The 3Worlds podcast home page is at www.3worlds.co.uk. Remember to visit Sacred Hoop - the shamansim magazine www.sacredhoop.org and you can visit Nicholas Breeze Wood's website at www.nicholaswood.net. For workshops on shamanism with Nicholas Breeze Wood visit www.earthstarcentre.com
The Society for Shamanic Practitioners www.shamansociety.org
The drawing for this podcast is a seidr ceremony drawn by Jan Morgan Wood - it illustrated an article on Seidr which is available for free download (together with the rest of the issue) at www.sacredhoop.org/Issues-pdf/Issue-18.pdf
The music at the end of this podcast is improvisation in early medieval Norse style from the CD 'Edda - An Icelandic Saga' by Sequentia

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast - Episode 11
item.description: A podcast about creating altars. The 3Worlds podcast home page is at www.3worlds.co.uk. Remember to visit Sacred Hoop - the shamansim magazine www.sacredhoop.org and you can visit Nicholas Breeze Wood's website at www.nicholaswood.net. For workshops on shamanism with Nicholas Breeze Wood visit www.earthstarcentre.com The photo for this podcast is a Mongolian shaman's altar created by Sarangerel Odigon The music at the end of this podcast is a 14th century Italian dance tune performed by the Dufay Collective
item.dc:creator: Nicholas Breeze Wood
item.itunes:summary:
A podcast about creating altars.

The music at the end of this podcast is a 14th century Italian dance tune performed by the Dufay Collective

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast - Episode 10
item.description: A podcast about Making offerrings to the spirits. The 3Worlds podcast home page is at www.3worlds.co.uk. Remember to visit Sacred Hoop - the shamansim magazine www.sacredhoop.org and you can visit Nicholas Breeze Wood's website at www.nicholaswood.net. For workshops on shamanism with Nicholas Breeze Wood visit www.earthstarcentre.com The photo for this podcast is a Mongolian Ovoo or Oboo - a shrine to the spirits The two songs at the end of this podcast are from the CD 'Ghost of a Crow' by Nicholas Breeze Wood

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast - Episode 9
item.description: A podcast about the shamanic journey and the types of journeys you can make. The 3Worlds podcast home page is at www.3worlds.co.uk. Remember to visit Sacred Hoop - the shamansim magazine www.sacredhoop.org and you can visit Nicholas Breeze Wood's website at www.nicholaswood.net. The painting for the cover of this podcast is by Jan Morgan Wood.. you can see more of her shamanic artwork at www.janmorganwood.com

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast - Episode 5
item.description: Sorry for the delay in getting this new episode up. Here is a short hello podcast, just to proove I have not fallen off the face of the earth. item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast - Episode 3
item.description: A small chat about Sacred Hoop Magazine, and then an introduction to the way of the sacred pipe and what a pipe ceremony is all about. There are also some traditional lakota pipe songs.
item.dc:creator: Nicholas Breeze Wood
item.itunes:summary: A small chat about Sacred Hoop Magazine, and then an introduction to the way of the sacred pipe and what a pipe ceremony is all about. There are also some traditional lakota pipe songs.

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast - Episode 2
item.description: Episode 2. Discussing what makes a person a shaman, the difference between shamanism and animisim, and what shamanic practices Nicholas personally works with.
item.dc:creator: Nicholas Breeze Wood

item.title: 3Worlds Shamanism Podcast - Episode 1
item.description: The first of a series of podcasts about shamanism (and a few other things) by Nicholas Breeze Wood, joint editor of the Sacred Hoop Magazine, the international magazine about shamanic spirituality, author of books on shamanism and well known shamanic practitioner and craftsperson.
item.dc:creator: Nicholas Breeze Wood
item.itunes:summary: The first of a series of podcasts about shamanism (and a few other things) by Nicholas Breeze Wood, joint editor of the Sacred Hoop Magazine, the international magazine about shamanic spirituality, author of books on shamanism and well known shamanic practitioner and craftsperson.
